participant_1.background:
I'm close to my family and enjoy reading and spending time at the beach.
i live in texas.
i cannot go a single day without eating ice cream.
i speak fluent german.
i love to surf.

participant_2.background:
I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.
I love going on YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family.
i work in a circus as a juggler.
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you. I am a big fan of Ween.
I'm glad to hear you like Ween! I have been a fan of them for many years.
Me too! I love their music and their live shows are always a blast.
I agree, their live shows are amazing. I have seen them a few times and they never disappoint.
I'm glad to hear that. I've only seen them once but it was a great experience.
What was your favorite song that they played?
It's hard to say, but I think my favorite song is Ocean Man.
That's a great song! I also love that one.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to surf. I live in Texas, so I don't get to do it as often as I would like, but I try to go as much as I can.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to surf.
It's a lot of fun! It can be challenging at first, but it's very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
